text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes Early in the morning, I turn on Fox Tabloid Entertainment, scour the internet for praise, send out a shitload of tweets to keep the piggies, er, my base, entertained, have lunch, watch Fox Tabloid Entertainment, get my fake tan touched up for my Coronavirus circus brief-whew!
